title: Home has  2 beds and 2 baths in Frankford section on NE Philadelphia!
description: Extremely well cared for single family detached home with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms in Frankford section on NE Philadelphia.  The property is fully fenced in and has a concrete front yard with a quaint covered front porch.  Step through a newer steel front door into a good sized living room.  There is a window for some natural sunlight.  As you walk past the stairway, you will enter the huge dining room, which could also be another living area.  The large eat-in kitchen follows which is big enough for a table for 6 plus.  Thus, letting the owner use the huge middle room for whatever they would like.  The kitchen has linoleum flooring, lots of cabinets and counter space which are clean as a whistle, and a small bathroom with a toilet.  There is a large wall unit air conditioner to chill the whole main level.  As you walk up the stairs, you can go right to the nice sized front bedroom or go left to the 3 piece, ceramic tiled hall bathroom, linen closet and entrance to the 2nd bedroom.  The windows are replaced throughout, there is a newer Lennox forced air heater and a 4 year old hot water heater.  The rear yard is a real gem.  It is fully fenced-in and features a nice brick wall barrier for true privacy.  This property is a real gem, make your appointment today. EMAIL YOUR NUMBER TO SET UP AN APPEARANCE!

title: A Gorgeous Smart Home in a 3 Year Old Development
description:
A gorgeous Smart Home in a 3 year old development with parking in Fairmount that is sure to please! Found on a lovely block, this home immediately impresses with its hardwood flooring, double height ceilings and immense windows in the living room, filling the first floor with ample natural light. The house offers Custom Blinds throughout the house (in living room blinds are motorized/ remote operated). A quick trip up a flight of stairs leads past the powder room into a gourmet kitchen, complete with stylish cabinetry, stainless steel Samsung appliances, 2020 Wi-Fi enabled touch screen refrigerator and tiled backsplash, not to mention a fabulous dining area to sit and have a lovely meal with your favorite guests. Continue upstairs and discover the two spacious bedrooms with ample closet space, a fabulous hall bathroom with dual vanity and a custom tiled tub and shower, as well as the immense master suite on a separate floor with custom walk-in closet and a stunning primary bath. The primary bathroom offers a spa-like experience with its tiled flooring, double vanity, custom tiled accent wall, mounted cabinets, large soaking tub and immense separate tiled shower with dual showerheads and frameless glass enclosure. From the primary bedroom, be sure to stop by the lovely wet bar and grab your favorite beverage from the wine fridge before heading out onto the large roof deck, with features stunning views of the city skyline! For those who still need some extra indoor space, head downstairs to the partial basement, finished with tiled flooring, ample storage space and laundry for your comfort and convenience. The attached carport has a pre-wired electric charger installed. Found in the bustling Fairmount neighborhood, this home is close to all that Fairmount Avenue has to offer, such as restaurants and bars, as well as Spring Garden Street and public transportation.
1705 Olive St

title: Live at 1434 Poplar St a a New Construction Bi-level Condo
description:
Live at 1434 Poplar St A a new construction bi-level condo located in Francisville. This spacious unit features a modern design, 2 bedrooms, and 2 full bathrooms. The open floor plan is designed for entertaining, complete with stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops & espresso cabinets in the kitchen. This home features hardwood floors thorough, a washer & dryer in the main hallway. The 1st level offers a living area great for entertaining, a full bathroom, and an oversized bedroom. The second level offers a beautiful open kitchen and dining area, a full bathroom, and another huge bedroom. Just a short walk away from the restaurants on Fairmount Ave, Ogden Park - close to the Art Museum, Center City, local shops, drug stores, the post office, and grocery stores. There is a shared roof deck and patio available at the building.

title: The Avenue is Francisville's Hottest New Apartment Building
description:
The Avenue is Francisville's hottest new apartment building located just a block off of Fairmount Avenue. All of the residents of The Avenue have access to the fully furnished rooftop deck, with amazing views of the Center City skyline! All units are equipped with the LATCH key-less entry system, a breakfast bar with modern soapstone quartz counter tops, 42-inch white shaker cabinetry, high end stainless steel appliances, luxury tile selections, glass enclosed showers with a rainfall head, custom California styled built out closets, and a ton of natural lighting from the floor to ceiling windows throughout. Just when you thought it couldn't get any better the commercial space will be a fully outfitted fitness center accessible to the residents at no additional charge!
1513 Ridge Ave #501

title: Renovated Bi-level 1 bedroom apartment in the heart of Rittenhouse Squ
description:
Renovated Bi-level 1 bedroom apartment in the heart of Rittenhouse Square!! Please note price reflects 1 month free on a 15 month lease at $1600/month. This boutique vintage building has all of the historic charm of a converted brownstone paired with modern updates throughout making for stylish and comfortable living. Enjoy restored hardwood floors and a kitchen with brand new appliances and a huge in unit laundry closet. Upstairs you will find a large bedroom with lots of windows that can accomodate any size bed and perfect for at home office set up. There is also a brand new renovated bathroom. The spiral staircase provides access to both floors but also exterior access to hallways on both floors for easy move in. PETS WELCOME! Many parking garages close by. Only first month and 1 month security needed at signing.
2015 Walnut St #2R

Many of the amazing features included in this 1 bedroom, 1 bath unit are: a highly desirable corner unit with an open floor layout which includes elegant hardwood flooring, tons of natural light, a well-designed kitchen that features plenty of cabinet and counter space and granite counter tops. Enjoy the luxury of low maintenance living along with an association that includes: all utilities included in condo fee, cable, 24hr security, community room, gym washer/dryers, and much more! title: Looking for the Perfect Location, This Property Has a Unique Floor Pla
description:
Welcome to 776 S 3rd Street! If you are looking for the perfect location, this property checks all the boxes for you in Queen Village. This property has a unique floor plan and tons of character that just works! Enter the condo through a private entrance. Walk inside to a Foyer with exposed brick and a large coat closet. To the left is a cute Sitting Room that can be used as a Dining Room with tons of light and Glass Sliding Doors leading to a private patio. The Kitchen has a Large Pantry, Quartz Countertops, Stainless Steel Appliances, and Tile Backsplash. There is a cute powder room with exposed brick and marble floors on the floor as well. Walk up the stairway with a Wall of Exposed Brick on your left leading you to a Large 2nd Floor Living Room with Hardwood Floors and Tons of Natural Light. There is also a separate room with hardwood floors and a window that can be used as a third bedroom, office or workout room. Walk up a level to a large front bedroom that has tons of natural sunlight with 3 Bay Windows Across, Exposed Brick, Walk-in Closet and a vanity with sink. There is a full bathroom and a second bedroom with a Juliet Balcony. The basement has tons of space of storage and laundry machines. The owner will also include the furniture if needed for a small upcharge. Located in the desirable Meredith catchment. Queen Village Mews also has a gorgeous Landscaped Common Courtyard in the rear of the building. Amazing Queen Village location with Mario Lanza Park / dog park nearby and countless great shops and restaurants within easy walking distance.
770-78 S 3rd St #776

title: East-facing Corner unit at the Parkway Condominium!!
description:
East facing corner unit at the Parkway Condominium. This unit features large foyer entrance, sun-lit rooms, parquet floors throughout living room and bedroom, newer kitchen and plenty of closet space. Enter into spacious foyer with storage closets, large living room is full of natural light, kitchen with cherry cabinets, granite countertops, tile backsplash, SS appliances and tile floor, three piece bathroom with tile floors and walls, nice sized bedrooms the corner of the builder with windows on two walls. In unit stacking washer and dryer. Parkway features 24-hour concierge/lobby attendant, fitness center, shuttle service and business center. Just steps away from the Art Museum, Kelly Drive and Boathouse Row. Convenient access to Center City, University City, and the major highways. Garage parking could be available at an additional cost at a later date. Tenant pays electric for cooking, heating and cooling, lights, hot water, as well as cable, and internet. Welcome home to Pier 3 Condominiums at Penn's Landing! This 2br/2ba 1300SF suns soaked unit on the Delaware River has amazing waterfront views and 1 car garage parking. The spacious open concept living room offers a wood-burning fireplace and direct access to the newly renovated kitchen. The owners suite has ample closet space, an en-suite bathroom, hardwood floors, and a private balcony facing the newly renovated atrium. You will love the second bedroom that has a spiral staircase to the bonus loft area which has significant amounts of extra living/bookshelf/storage space. In-unit washer/dryer. Pier 3 Condominiums at Penn's Landing provides the following on-site amenities: 24-hour concierge, heated indoor pool, fitness room, sun deck on the Delaware River, and relaxation lounge. This pet friendly building allows 2 animals up to 40 pounds each. Short walking distance to Spruce Street Harbor Park, Blue Cross RiverRink, Cherry Street Pier and Race Street Pier. Close to historical attractions including the Liberty Bell and Independence Hall, Independence Visitor Center, National Constitution Center, and Museum of the American Revolution. Unit comes fully furnished or unfurnished based on your preference.
3 N Columbus Blvd #TD442

description:

description:

It offers 2 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, washer/dryer, GARAGE PARKING (negotiable) and is overlooking the central courtyard with pergolas and fountain. description:

Loft can be used as a guest sleeping area, study, or whatever you prefer! Down the hall is a full bath with ceramic tile, extra wide vanity with sink and a shower & toilet area. The bedroom features access to the large deck. Naval Square is a beautiful 20-acre guard, gated community conveniently located in Graduate Hospital. A quick walk to Rittenhouse and Fitler Square, HUP, CHOP and UPenn. Owner pays HOA, water, and sewer. Tenant pays gas, electric, cable, internet, and phone. $70 per person application fee. One time $400 move in/move out fee. Application includes credit check, verification of income, verification of employment, criminal and background check, previous housing check.
